RBinsert

public static exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode RBinsert(int addItem,
                                                  exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode r,
                                                  exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode p)
Method to insert a new node in the tree

Parameters:
addItem - the value being added to the tree
r - the top of the subtree currently being examined to find a location for the new node
p - the parent node of the current r node
Returns:
the sub tree after the insertion, gets passed back through the call stack till the tree is rebuilt

RBfix

public static void RBfix(int addItem,
                         exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode r)
Method to call the remedyDoubleRed with the location of the most recently added node.

Parameters:
addItem - the value being added to the tree
r - the top of the subtree currently being examined to find a location for the new node

remedyDoubleRed

public static void remedyDoubleRed(exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode z)
Method to examine a tree after an insertion and fix any errors that may have arrisen from the insertion of the new node.

Parameters:
z - the node you want to have examined from up the rest of the tree

RBdelete

public static void RBdelete(int delItem,
                            exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode r)
Method used to find a node to be deleted from the tree.

Parameters:
delItem - value of node to be deleted
r - node of currently evaluating node (searching for the delItem)

deleteMin

public static exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode deleteMin(exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode r)
Method used to insert items into the binary search tree in a recursive fashion

Parameters:
r - node of currently evaluating node (searching for replacement for deleted node)
Returns:
value of node to take the place of deleting node

RBDelFix

                            exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode y,
                            exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode x)
Method to examine a tree after a deletion and fix any errors that may have arrisen from the delete of the given node.

Parameters:
r - the node you want to have examined from up the rest of the tree

restructure

public static exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode restructure(exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode x)
Method to restructure trees/subtrees as needed to get them balanced by shifting nodes around so that straight lines of nodes as well as hooks in lines get turned into more balanced distributions.

Parameters:
x - the node you want to have its parent and grandparent examined for balancing
Returns:
the restructured subtree's top node

tfAnsGen

public static void tfAnsGen()
generates a true false answer using an external variable in the qHolder class

mcGen

public static void mcGen()
generates a Multiple Choice question

mcAnsGen

public static void mcAnsGen()
generates a Multiple Choice answer using an external variable in the qHolder class

fibGen

public static void fibGen()
generates a fill in the blank question about either pre, post, or in orderings of the tree. This method also calls the ordering methods to retreive their own answers.

snapShot

public static void snapShot(exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode top,
                            int qtype)
Method used to begin printing a binary tree to the gaigs environment using the recursiveTree class visualization.

Parameters:
top - the top node of the tree to be printed off
qtype - the int value representing the type of question to possibly ask for this slide (-1 - none, 0 - TF, 1 - TF answer, 2 - Multiple Choice, 3 - Multiple Choice answer, 4 - Fill in the Blank)

snapShotL

public static void snapShotL(exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode top)
Method used to print the left children of a binary tree to the gaigs environment using the recursiveTree class visualization.

Parameters:
top - the top node of the tree to be printed off

snapShotR

public static void snapShotR(exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode top)
Method used to print the right children of a binary tree to the gaigs environment using the recursiveTree class visualization.

Parameters:
top - the top node of the tree to be printed off

clearcolors

public static void clearcolors(exe.rbtreemyles.BinaryNode r)
Method used to clear the color of all the nodes in a root

Parameters:
r - the top node of the tree to be cleaned
